original_text: Jacob's well was there; so Jesus, wearied as he was from his journey, was sitting beside the well. It was about the sixth hour.
korean_text: 거기 또 야곱의 우물이 있더라 예수께서 길 가시다가 피곤하여 우물 곁에 그대로 앉으시니 때가 여섯 시쯤 되었더라

sentences.original_text: so Jesus was sitting beside the well
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 예수님은 우물 곁에 앉아 계셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: wearied as he was from his journey
It was about the sixth hour
